name: geopackage

scripts.btest: browserify ./test/test.js --standalone tests --exclude sqlite3 --exclude lwip --exclude inquirer -o bundle/test.bundle.js
scripts.btestwatch: watchify ./test/test.js -d -v --standalone tests --exclude sqlite3 --exclude lwip --exclude inquirer -o bundle/test.bundle.js
scripts.build: browserify -t browserify-css geopackage.js --standalone geopackage --exclude sqlite3 --exclude lwip --exclude inquirer -o static/geopackage.js
scripts.watch: watchify -t browserify-css geopackage.js -v --standalone geopackage --exclude sqlite3 --exclude lwip --exclude inquirer -o static/geopackage.js
